nodes.text: Kallik Kan was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto residing on Nar Shaddaa around 3643 BBY,[source?] when he was killed.

Kallik Kan appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Nar Shaddaa. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
